name: Brandon Wyatt
description:
I am fun, outgoing, sharp witted, and strong minded.I believe in experiencing life, new ideas, and am open to trying.I am also passionate by nature which means in all aspects of my life! I throw myself in fully to anything that’s important to me. I believe the experiences we have and the relationships in our life far outweigh chase for material gain.I am extremely affectionate and still believe in true romantic Love.
I am hoping to meet someone who shares similar but not exact ideals because I believe we can learn from each other and that we continue to grow and evolve through out our lives.I don’t box myself into my own little world and neither should you.
My interests are varied and many and I love in depth conversation.We don’t need to agree on everything because debate is a good thing.I believe past is gone and you can’t change it,thus,you should be ready to forge into the future as I am.I don’t want to hear everything that went wrong in your past relationships and I won’t bore you with mine. We should be able to learn from our mistakes and move forward.
